javax.servlet

接口 ServletConfig

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CGIServlet, CookiesBaseTest.CookieServlet, DefaultServlet, DuplicateMappingParamServlet, GenericServlet, HostManagerServlet, HTMLHostManagerServlet, HTMLManagerServlet, Http2TestBase.SimpleServlet, HttpJspBase, HttpServlet, JMXProxyServlet, JspServlet, ManagerServlet, MyAnnotatedServlet, NoMappingParamServlet, ParamServlet, SSIServlet, StandardWrapper, StandardWrapperFacade, StatusManagerServlet, TestAsyncContextImpl.Bug58751AsyncServlet, TestBug49158.TestBug49158Servlet, TesterHttpJspBase, TesterServlet, TesterServletEncodeUrl, TesterServletWithAnnotations, TesterServletWithLifeCycleMethods, TesterSupport.SimpleServlet, TestPageContextImpl.Bug56010, TestRemoteIpFilter.MockHttpServlet, TestServletSecurity.Foo, TestServletSecurity.FooBar, TestServletSecurityMappings.Default, TestServletSecurityMappings.Foo, TestServletSecurityMappings.Root, TestServletSecurityMappings.SecureDefault, TestServletSecurityMappings.SecureFoo, TestServletSecurityMappings.SecureRoot, TestStandardContext.Bug49922ForwardServlet, TestStandardContext.Bug49922IncludeServlet, TestStandardContext.Bug49922Servlet, TestStandardContext.Bug49922TargetServlet, TestStandardContext.Bug51376Servlet, TestStandardContext.Foo, TestStandardContextAliases.TestServlet, TestStandardContextResources.GetResourceServlet, TestStandardWrapper.Bug51445Servlet, TestStandardWrapper.DenyAllServlet, TestStandardWrapper.MethodConstraintServlet, TestStandardWrapper.RoleAllowServlet, TestStandardWrapper.RoleDenyServlet, TestStandardWrapper.SubclassAllowAllServlet, TestStandardWrapper.SubclassDenyAllServlet, TestStandardWrapper.TestServlet, TestStandardWrapper.UncoveredGetServlet, TestTomcat.GetResource, TestTomcat.HelloWorld, TestTomcat.HelloWorldJndi, TestTomcat.HelloWorldSession, Tomcat.ExistingStandardWrapper, TomcatBaseTest.EchoBodyServlet, TomcatBaseTest.HelloWorldServlet, TomcatBaseTest.SnoopServlet, WebdavServlet

    public interface ServletConfig
    A servlet configuration object used by a servlet container to pass information to a servlet during initialization.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getInitParameter(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a String containing the value of the named initialization parameter, or null if the parameter does not exist.
      java.util.Enumeration<java.lang.String> getInitParameterNames()
      Returns the names of the servlet's initialization parameters as an Enumeration of String objects, or an empty Enumeration if the servlet has no initialization parameters.
      ServletContext getServletContext()
      Returns a reference to the ServletContext in which the caller is executing.
      java.lang.String getServletName()
      Returns the name of this servlet instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getServletName

        java.lang.String getServletName()
        Returns the name of this servlet instance. The name may be provided via server administration, assigned in the web application deployment descriptor, or for an unregistered (and thus unnamed) servlet instance it will be the servlet's class name.
        返回:
        the name of the servlet instance

      • getServletContext

        ServletContext getServletContext()
        Returns a reference to the ServletContext in which the caller is executing.
        返回:
        a ServletContext object, used by the caller to interact with its servlet container
        另请参阅:
        ServletContext

      • getInitParameter

        java.lang.String getInitParameter(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a String containing the value of the named initialization parameter, or null if the parameter does not exist.
        参数:
        name - a String specifying the name of the initialization parameter
        返回:
        a String containing the value of the initialization parameter

      • getInitParameterNames

        java.util.Enumeration<java.lang.String> getInitParameterNames()
        Returns the names of the servlet's initialization parameters as an Enumeration of String objects, or an empty Enumeration if the servlet has no initialization parameters.
        返回:
        an Enumeration of String objects containing the names of the servlet's initialization parameters
